block.name: AES Decrypt
block.check: #if $mode() == '1' then True else False# or len($iv) in (16, 24, 32)
block.doc:
AES Decrypt block, for use with the gnuradio. It support those modes:
* ECB: Fixed block mode (multiple of key) and don't use a IV. * CBC: Fixed block mode (multiple of key / IV) * CFB: Self sync stream cipher. Don't need extra padding or fixed blocks. * OFB: Sync stream mode (multiple of key / IV)
The modes ECB, CBC and OFB needs multiples of 16, 24 or 32 bytes (the used key length) You must use padding before to feed the AES block in those modes.
The key / IV length can be:
* 16 bytes for use AES 128 * 24 bytes for use AES 192 * 32 bytes for use AES 256
This block automatically select the adequate mode for the supplied key length.
